name: Jumpy Smiley - The endless adventures of a bouncing skippy geometry ball
name_original: Jumpy Smiley - The endless adventures of a bouncing skippy geometry ball
description:
Bounce your way up through the skies and reach new heights in this endless adventure!

Jumpy, the constantly moving ball, needs your help to climb all the way through the platforms of death. Tap the screen to jump and avoid the obstacles. Get loads of points to unlock new characters.

Let's see how far up you can go! ;)
